meanings: (and) so, therefore, accordingly, consequently, (앞서 말한 이유 때문에) thus, for that[this] reason, on that account[score]

vlive.korean: 그래서 이건 탈락 땡! So, this is out! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 로센키🌹
그래서 되게 뭔가... And so it was like... 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 산이의 소소한 일상🥰
그래서 멤버들한테... So, other members... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 😁 Happy DK & Vernon Day 🤟

examples.korean: I didn’t know I’d have to make a speech—I just had to wing it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 내가 연설을 해야 할 줄은 몰랐어요. 그래서 그냥 즉흥적으로 해야 했어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I didn’t know I’d have to make a speech—I just had to wing it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We are very busy—so much so that we won’t be able to take time off this year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 아주 바빠요. 너무 그래서[바빠서] 올해는 쉴 시간을 못 낼 것 같아요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We are very busy—so much so that we won’t be able to take time off this year. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: And then I’m like ‘No Way!’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그래서 내가 말하는 거야. “절대 안 돼!”라고. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: And then I’m like ‘No Way!’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: And I didn’t think any more of it, right, but Mum says I should see a doctor. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그래서 난 그것에 대해 더 이상 생각 안 했지, 그런데 말야, 엄마께서 나더러 병원에 가 봐야 한다는 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: And I didn’t think any more of it, right, but Mum says I should see a doctor. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘You’ve been smoking again.’ ‘So?’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “당신 또 담배 피우고 있었군요.” “그래서?” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘You’ve been smoking again.’ ‘So?’ Add to Wordbook
